Terungkap! Inilah yang Sebenarnya Terjadi pada Todd Rivaldo Ferre di Timnas U-22
01 Nov 2019, 14:54 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dokter Timnas Indonesia, Syarif Alwi akhirnya angkat bicara mengenai apa yang terjadi pada Todd Rivaldo Ferre di skuad timnas Indonesia U-22. Menurutnya, Todd Rivaldo yang memutuskan untuk meninggalkan pemusatan latihan ketika akan melakukan pengobatan.
Todd Rivaldo Ferre sejatinya datang memenuhi undangan pemusatan latihan yang digelar Timnas Indonesia U-22 pada Oktober 2019. Namun, pemain berusia 20 tahun itu datang dengan kondisi cedera pergelangan kaki.
Tim medis Timnas Indonesia U-22 kemudian berniat memeriksa kondisi cedera yang dialami Todd melalui tes MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging). Namun, Todd justru meninggalkan pemusatan latihan tanpa seizin pelatih Indra Sjafri.
"Waktu dia latihan bersama Timnas Indonesia U-22 di Lapangan G Senayan, tiba-tiba dia cedera pada engkelnya. Kami mengambil kesimpulan, semua pemain yang mengalami cedera baik itu engkel, harus di tes MRI. Soalnya dia mengeluh sakit," kata Syarif Alwi, Kamis (31/10/2019).
"Kalau ada keluhan, ya kami harus MRI ke rumah sakit dan harus dipastikan. Kami cuma takut, cedera Todd harus dibantu dengan keterangan diagnosis buat kami berikan penjelasan ke panitia SEA Games," lanjut sokter yang akrab disapa Papi itu.
Situasi cedera dan tindakan indisipliner membuat Todd Rivaldo Ferre kemungkinan besar tak dibawa Timnas Indonesia U-22 ke SEA Games 2019. Hal ini tentu menjadi kerugian karena saat ini karier Todd sedang bersinar bersama klubnya, Persipura Jayapura.

Revealed! This is what actually happened to Todd Rivaldo Ferre in the U-22 national team
Nov 1 2019, 14:54 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian national team doctor, Syarif Alwi finally spoke about what happened to Todd Rivaldo Ferre in the U-22 Indonesian national team squad. According to him, Todd Rivaldo who decided to leave the training camp when going to treatment.
Todd Rivaldo Ferre actually came to meet the invitation to the training camp held by the Indonesian U-22 national team in October 2019. However, the 20-year-old player came with an ankle injury.
The U-22 Indonesia National Team medical team then intends to examine the condition of the injury suffered by Todd through an MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging) test. However, Todd actually left the training camp without permission from coach Indra Sjafri.
"When he was training with the Indonesian U-22 national team at Field G Senayan, he suddenly injured his ankle. We concluded that all players who suffered both injuries were ankles, had to have an MRI test. Because he complained of illness," said Syarif Alwi , Thursday (10/31/2019).
"If there are complaints, yes we must MRI to the hospital and must be ascertained. We are just afraid, Todd's injury must be assisted with diagnostic information for us to provide an explanation to the SEA Games committee," continued the doctor who is familiarly called Papi.
The injury situation and disciplinary action make Todd Rivaldo Ferre most likely not brought by the Indonesian U-22 national team to the 2019 SEA Games. This is certainly a disadvantage because Todd's career is currently shining with his club, Persipura Jayapura.
